local.name: __index
local.description:
- table
- key

类似于 js 的 getter

local.name: __newindex
local.description:
- table
- key
- value

类似于 js 的 setter, 与 [Writing doesn’t use prototype](https://javascript.info/prototype-inheritance#writing-doesn-t-use-prototype)设计一致

external.name: makereadonly
external.description:
- table
- key

使得 key 变为只读

external.name: addsetter
external.description:
- table
- key
- fn: 即为 setter

使得 key 变为只读

external.name: Class
external.description:
- base: base class
- \_ctor: constructor function
- props: 定义 setter

  ```js
  {key1: setter1(t, v, old), ...}
  ```

注意:

1. (func, nil, ?) == (nil, func, ?), 即说明 base 就是一个 constructor
2. (func1, func2, ?) == (nil, func2, ?), \_ctor 的优先级高 base

return: class

- (self, ...): 构造函数
- .is_a(self, klass): 是否是某个 klass
- .\_ctor: constructor function
- .\_base: base class

external.name: ClassRegistry
external.description:
- type: array

通过 @Class 生成的, 都会在这个数组里面
